text: The provinces of Iran are divided into counties called shahrestan (, shahrestƒÅn). They usually contain a city center, and a bunch of villages around them. Counties are divided into districts. They are also usually some cities in each county. As of the year 2005, Iran had 324 counties. In 2021 there were 471. ==County list== The following is a list of counties by province: ===Tehran Province=== *Damavand County *Firuzkuh County *Islamshahr County *Karaj County *Nazarabad County
